about_the_game:
This game is based on a fairy tale, a king named Erfu killed a monster with the help of his friend Wei. In this game, we will be Wei, take a great adventure, where show landscape of ancient story, monsters out of our imagine, and of cource an excellent story.

During the adventure, we will meet many monsters which only appear in fairy tales, fighting with them using experienced skill about spear, and magic in element embodiment. Monsters are so dangerous that we must be careful in being close, finding their weakness, and beat them using out skills.

Embodiment means we join a story, experience it by just like a audience, or play a role in this story, and finally after that, we can be the hero in that story when fight with enemies.
